In a message dated 8/16/2004 10:15:32 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
aimeel73@... writes:

(who loves it when people are just *nailing* it, time
and time again, on email lists, it's like a great
book, but in installments lol)<<<<<

Me too!
I have a great "Books Of" series. The Book of Joyce, The Book of Deb, the
Book of Julie, The Book of Betsy, etc.

I'll have to start the new Book Of Danielle <g>

Of course, I'm working on the REAL Book of Sandra, but can't get her off her
butt to do anything about it! <G>

~Kelly
==============

<>Aaaawwwww, shucks. You guys are so sweet! :)

--Danielle

http://www.danielleconger.com/Homeschool/Welcomehome.html
